name: eggplant
description: Eggplant, or aubergine, is a glossy purple vegetable with a mild flavor, used in dishes like ratatouille and eggplant parmesan.

name: leek
description: Leek is a mild, onion-like vegetable with long green leaves and a white stalk, often used in soups, stews, and saut√©s.

name: mushrooms
description: Mushrooms are edible fungi with a savory flavor, used in various cuisines for soups, sauces, and stir-fries.

name: corn
description: Corn is a widely grown cereal plant, valued for its edible kernels used in food, animal feed, and industrial products.

name: sweet potatoes
description: Sweet potatoes are sweet, starchy root vegetables, rich in vitamins and fiber, commonly used in savory and sweet dishes.

name: carrot
description: Carrots are crunchy, orange root vegetables, rich in vitamins, especially vitamin A, and commonly used in salads, soups, and as a snack.

name: grape
description: Grapes are small, sweet, and juicy fruits, typically grown in clusters, and are used fresh or in products like wine, raisins, and juice.

name: blueberries
description: Blueberries are small, round, and sweet berries, rich in antioxidants, often eaten fresh or used in desserts, smoothies, and jams.
